dockerimage.name: _:Base:gdb
dockerimage.text: RUN apt-get install -y texinfo wget libreadline-dev RUN wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gdb/gdb-8.1.tar.xz RUN tar -xf gdb-8.1.tar.xz WORKDIR gdb-8.1/ RUN ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --with-python=/usr/bin/python3 --with-system-readline --without-guile && make -j8 RUN make -C gdb install RUN cd .. && rm -r gdb-8.1 && rm -r gdb-8.1.tar.xz
